The Dragon Sin of Wrath. All weapons share the Darkness element. Longsword rewards aggressive Burst play with massive Burst-activated damage boosts; Axe uses Demon Energy teleport combos for mobile DPS; Dual Swords is extremely fast with Demonic Power granting AOE damage and self-healing.
